about_the_game: The demo version includes the first six chapters of three characters, and it will be updated after each major release. You can also play the latest version on itch.io. After the game is completed, the demo will be re-uploaded and made available for purchase.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains adult themes such as cannibalism, suicide, profanity, fantastical bloodiness, self-mutilation, partial nudity, and sexually suggestive scenes. Please confirm carefully before downloading and playing.

detailed_description: The demo version includes the first six chapters of three characters, and it will be updated after each major release. You can also play the latest version on itch.io. After the game is completed, the demo will be re-uploaded and made available for purchase.

fullgame.name: Fried chicken wings cause love fires

name: Fried Chicken Wings Cause Love Fires Demo
short_description: "Fried Chicken Wings Cause a Love Fire" is a BL mystery comedy long visual novel. It uses the first-person perspective with a fixed protagonist, Aris; contains elements of horror and sexual innuendo.
